entry.title: This is Me Trying
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,925Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 322

Summary: "Jay's here tonight. I could introduce them.” Dick mumbles with a smile and you notice him burying his face into the side of your friend's hair. Ugh.“Jason?” A younger voice pipes up, you turn your head to take in the newcomers. “If you hate your friend you could just say that, there is no need for torture.” Dick laughs before introducing his younger brother, Damian.OrThe time your friend drags you to a street race and you meet her ridiculously good looking boyfriend and his intimidating brothers.

entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,879Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 41

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. “I’ll find a way.” he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night. Not in person at least.On the news, getting adopted by Bruce Wayne of all people, waving and smiling to the cameras, it never reached his eyes the way his smile always did when we were younger.Then he vanished for good.

entry.title: Nightmares And (Pillow) Barriers
entry.summary:
Author: Donnaez

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,286Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 8

Summary: In a small city in Kansas, for the past eighteen years, twenty-seven men ran away from town to be never seen again, all with only one correlation: having couple's therapy with a woman named Aubrey Holsman. When the information, by Ma Kent's intel, arrived at Batman's ears, he found himself having no other option but send you and Jason Todd to investigate while undercover as clients, hoping to become her next victim.
